Song.title: Our Great God
Song.copyright: Fernando Ortega | Mac Powell Â© 2002 New Spring (Admin. by Brentwood-Benson Music Publishing, Inc.) Word Music, LLC (a div. of Word Music Group, Inc.)

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: E[A]ternal God unch[Em]anging mys[Em7]terious and unkn[A]own Your b[A]oundless love Unf[Em]ailing gr[Em7]ace and mercy sh[A]own Bright s[F#m]eraphim in c[D]easeless flight Ar[F#m]ound Your glorious thr[D]one They r[A]aise their voices [Em]day and night In pr[Em7]aise to You al[A]one
Chorus: Hallel[A]u -- j[Em]ah glory b[D]e to our great G[A]od Hallel[A]u -- j[Em]ah glory b[D]e to our great G[A]od
Verse 2: Lord w[A]e are weak and fr[Em]ail H[Em7]elpless in the st[A]orm Surr[A]ound us with Your [Em]angels H[Em7]old us in Your a[A]rms Our c[F#m]old and ruthless [D]enemy His pl[F#m]easure is our h[D]arm Rise [A]up O Lord and [Em]he will flee Bef[Em7]ore our sov'reign G[A]od
Verse 3: Let [A]ev'ry creature [Em]in the sea And [Em7]ev'ry flying b[A]ird Let [A]ev'ry mountain [Em]Ev'ry field and v[Em7]alley of the e[A]arth Let [F#m]all the moons and [D]all the stars In [F#m]all the univ[D]erse Sing pr[A]aises to the l[Em]iving God Who r[Em7]ules them by His W[A]ord
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 eternal god unchanging mysterious and unknown your boundless love unfailing grace and mercy shown bright seraphim in ceaseless flight around your glorious throne they raise their voices day and night in praise to you alone chorus hallelu jah glory be to our great god hallelu jah glory be to our great god verse 2 lord we are weak and frail helpless in the storm surround us with your angels hold us in your arms our cold and ruthless enemy his pleasure is our harm rise up o lord and he will flee before our sovreign god verse 3 let evry creature in the sea and evry flying bird let evry mountain evry field and valley of the earth let all the moons and all the stars in all the universe sing praises to the living god who rules them by his word
